answers.answer: I go for my sonogram  next Monday. But I had an OB appointment yesterday and my blood pressure was high, the monitored me for five hours just to tell me I don't have preeclampsia, but I'm at risk. The Dr issued me to a 24hour urine screening for protein. If things don't get better they will enduce me at 37 weeks.
I went at 37 th week and my baby is 7lb 7onz so that doesn't mean that the baby is large ...hes average weight ...why induction?
My last sonogram was at 38 weeks weighing 7.8lbs and didn't  seem concerned at all. And big babies run in my family too.

Well she decided to try to induce because baby is big and also because like I'm due the 27th and she will be out of town for those days. She told me it was up to me if I wanted to wait for baby to come on her own and if she did and my doctor wasn't here the doctor on call would deliver and it's a guy. I'm not to happy to have a male doctor see me since I have a really bad experience with my first who delivered my first baby.

question: Today I went to my doctor appointment im 37 weeks and  she gave me a sonogram to check the weight of my baby well my little girl is 7lbs 5oz and my doctor decided to schedule me for a induction on the 22nd of December because of my babies weight. Well I did agree to get induced because I have a history of having big babies. Because my first was born at 39 weeks weighing 9lbs 3oz and my doctor said chances are I do again.What have yall ladies been through with those sonograms
title: What has been y'alls ladies experience
